twice *k1 kfb repeat from *around 49 stitches round 2 knit arrange stitches on 4 dpns 14 14 14 7 lace pattern see lace chart round 3 k1 k2tog yo k1 yo s1 k1 psso finishing instructions k1 repeat around round 4 knit refer to page round 5 k2tog yo k3 yo s1 k1 psso repeat around round 6 knit repeat lace pattern once more for knee length dress or twice more for floor-length gown round15 purl variation row 45 k2 * knit 3 k2tog repeat from * to last two stitches k2 loosely cast on 34 stitches in black round 47 k2 * knit 2 k2 decrease repeat leaving a long tail for seaming from * to last two stitches k2 knit from pattern as follows round 49 k2 * knit 1 k2 decrease repeat from * to last two stitches k2 shoes round 51 k2 * k2 decrease repeat from * to row 1 knit last two stitches k2 row 2 purl draw yarn through remaining stitches round 3 knit 12 sts black 3 stitches and pull to close secure yarn white 4 stitches black 3 stitches white knit black to end of round ruffle skirt round 4 purl in black socks pick up 34 stitches around the doll s waist with doll held upside down work row 5-8 continue in white work in stockinette stitch knitting the rs odd the skirt as follows row and purling the ws even row row 1 knit row 2 and all ws even -- row purl legs row 3 *k1 kfb repeat from * around row 9-14 join skin colour work in row 5 *k1 kfb repeat from * around stockinette stitch row 7 purl bodice cast off knitwise row 15-30 join dress colour work in seam doll stockinette stitch using tail from top of head sew the face sides of the doll together with an row 31-38 join skin colour work in invisible seam stockinette stitch seam skirt hair using tail from cast off edge sew the row 39-42 join hair colour work in sides of the skirt together with an stockinette stitch for four
